issue_title: [Feature] 添加 update() 方法批量更新 Todo 属性
implementation_summary: Added update() method to Todo class that allows batch updating of text and done attributes with a single updated_at timestamp update. The method validates text is not empty (after stripping whitespace) and only updates timestamp when actual changes are provided.
